name: All Butter, Really Flaky Pie Dough
description: [Psst! There’s a newer, even flakier pie crust on the site.]
recipeYield: Makes enough dough for one double-, or two single-crust pies.
recipeIngredient: 2 sticks (8 ounces, 225 grams tablespoons or 1 cup) unsalted butter, very cold

recipeInstructions.text:
2 1/2 cups (315 grams) flour
1 tablespoon (15 grams) sugar
1 teaspoon (5 grams) table salt
2 sticks (8 ounces, 225 grams tablespoons or 1 cup) unsalted butter, very cold
